GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with optional filtering by topic and sorting by specified columns (sort_by) and order (asc/desc). If the topic query is omitted, all articles will be returned.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of articles by Id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a specified article ID

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment for an article. Request body accepts an object with 'username' and 'body'. Responds with the posted comment.

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: This is so inspiring! Really great article.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the votes for a specific article. Request body accepts an object in the form { inc_votes: newVote }, where newVote indicates how much the votes property should be updated.
